ygData.subject: Re: Obsidian Shard minor spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: spoiler... ... The shard is a uncommon/rare drop, kobold hide boots are the common. I would guess the kobold is level 30ish.  He s definitely not as tough as
ygData.messageBody:
spoiler...
























> The shard is dropped by the Kobold Predator in Solusek A. It's hard to
> describe where he is located, but I can tell you he roams a short corridor
> above the Foreman's room. There is a goblin placeholder there most of the
> time. The corridor has a door that leads to a room with stairs. Down the
> stairs and back around to the right leads to the Foreman's room.

The shard is a uncommon/rare drop, kobold hide boots are the common.
I would guess the kobold is level 30ish. He's definitely not as
tough as the greater kobolds in SolB. The corridor he wanders in
is fairly close to the lavastorm entrance. Most shamans see invis,
and most goblins agro on any level player.

Harmonic.
